author: prasadc
msg: HIVE-883. Metastore Server should call System.exit() on error.

author: dbrosius
msg: retain exception stack traces in the verifier

author: lektran
msg: Catch ClassCastExceptions in <store-value/> operations, these will occur if you have a null GenericValue (perhaps from a lookup that returned no results), set some fields on it and then try to store it.  What you actually have at that point is a FastMap created when you set the fields.
Also added use of the utility MethodContext.setErrorReturn(String, SimpleMethod) rather than manually adding errors to the environment context.
